text: Aviano is a town and comune in the province of Pordenone. It is near the Dolomites mountain range in Friuli-Venezia Giulia, northern Italy. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website *Aviano 31st Fighter Wing *Aviano American High School Alumni *Aviano Blog (Blog about stores, restaurants, and events surrounding Aviano AB) Category:Towns in Italy Category:Settlements in Pordenone
title: Aviano
